Name: Rock Chain: True/False VI
Desc:
This is a chain skill that shares its skill level with Rock Chain: Earth. After using Rock Chain: Earth, Hoyoung teleports to the end of the rock and collapses it.
Rock Chain: True lets you select left and right in combination with arrow keys. Rock Chain: False only allows moving forward.
Rock Chain: False does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.
Required Skill: This is a chain skill that shares its skill level with Rock Chain: Earth Lv. 20 or higher
